name: Pilot Makers
about: Pilot Makers Advanced Flight Academy, located in Provo, Utah, is dedicated to developing passionate, professional aviators. Our mission is to empower pilots across the Mountain West and beyond by emphasizing stick-and-rudder skills, situational awareness, and a comprehensive understanding of the flight envelope. We address the critical issue of Loss of Control In Flight (LOC-I) through specialized training programs, including aerobatics, tailwheel endorsements, and Upset Prevention and Recovery Training. Our diverse fleet includes legendary aircraft such as the Extra 300L, Super Decathlon, and Piper Archer II, all maintained to the highest standards. By focusing on holistic training and nurturing confidence, expertise, and understanding, we cultivate safe, competent aviators whether for professional careers or recreational flying. Join us for an unparalleled instruction and enjoyable training journey.
